title: Fullscript | Daily Immune Defender
description: BodyHealth Daily Immune Defender contains our unique Advanced Immune Support Blend which includes Elderberry, Echinacea, Astragalus, Goldenseal, 1 billion
cleaned_text: SKU: BOD727-DID1 BodyHealth Daily Immune Defender contains our unique Advanced Immune Support Blend which includes Elderberry, Echinacea, Astragalus, Goldenseal, 1 billion probiotic organisms, FOS and Colostrum boosted with Zinc & Vitamin C. Boost your immune system for daily protection with 3 of nature's most powerful and clinically proven ingredients.* Use for colds, seasonal allergies and other environmental stressors while shielding yourself against the environment.* Take 2 capsules daily, with or without food or as directed by a health care professional. Serving Size: 2 Capsules Amount Per Serving Vitamin C ... 90 mg (as Ascorbic Acid) Zinc ... 22 mg (as Zinc Citrate) Immune Support Blend ... 1,000 mg Elderberry Magnesium Stearate, Rice Flour Keep out of reach of children.
